projects.title: Sandwich Spread
projects.description: A modern mobile e-commerce application built with Angular and Ionic. Features product browsing, shopping cart, checkout, order management, and admin dashboard. Fully responsive design optimized for mobile devices.

projects.title: Weather Analyzer
projects.description: A comprehensive real-time weather analysis dashboard with interactive maps, live weather updates, advanced analytics, and data export capabilities. Features trend analysis, distribution charts, and automatic weather alerts.

projects.title: DriftLens Blog
projects.description: A full-featured social blogging platform with user authentication, post creation, comments, likes, messaging, groups, notifications, and admin dashboard. Includes guest browsing, search functionality, and mobile-responsive design.

projects.title: Pet Pantry
projects.description: A comprehensive full-stack e-commerce platform for pet products with shopping cart, payment processing, order management, admin dashboard, reviews, support chat, inventory management, and PDF invoice generation.
